name: quest_in_progress
description:
An intrepid knight ventures into a haunted castle to rescue a princess! That's, uh... that's kind of generic, isn't it? Maybe you can give some input and help workshop it a bit.

Use WASD to move, press J to use your weapon (if you have one). All controls can be changed from the Options menu on the title screen.

Created for Dogpit Jam 2018.
